Large Language Models

2023-06-03

Source: vignettes/large_language_models.Rmd
large_language_models.Rmd

Setup 

library(googleAuthR)
library(googleCloudVertexAIR)

options(googleAuthR.scopes.selected = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform")

gar_auth_service(json_file = Sys.getenv("GAR_SERVICE_JSON"))

Set global arguements 

projectId <- Sys.getenv("GCVA_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID")
gcva_region_set(region = "us-central1")
## 2023-06-03 15:46:16> Region set to 'us-central1'
gcva_project_set(projectId = projectId)
## 2023-06-03 15:46:16> ProjectId set to 'gc-vertex-ai-r'

Test Prompt - Text Generation

https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/text/test-text-prompts

result <- gcva_text_gen_predict(
  prompt="Give me ten interview questions for the role of a Python software engineer.",
  modelId="text-bison"
)

cat(result)
## ===================================================
##          Response:       
##  ===================================================
##  1. What is your experience with Python?
## 2. What are your favorite Python libraries?
## 3. What are your strengths and weaknesses as a Python developer?
## 4. How would you solve a complex problem using Python?
## 5. Can you write a Python program to solve a real-world problem?
## 6. How would you unit test a Python program?
## 7. How would you deploy a Python application?
## 8. What are the best practices for writing Python code?
## 9. What are the latest trends in Python development?
## 10. What are your salary expectations? 
## ===================================================
